snippet: Djokovic beat Kei Nishikori at the ATP World Tour Finals on Sunday, stretching his win streak to 15 matches at the season-ending event. He faces Federer faces on Tuesday.
abstract: Tennis Roundup; Novak Djokovic defeats Kei Nishikori at ATP World Tour Finals tennis tournament match; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Djokovic beat Kei Nishikori at the ATP World Tour Finals on Sunday, stretching his win streak to 15 matches at the season-ending event. He faces Federer faces on Tuesday.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer Win at ATP Finals
headline.print_headline: Djokovic and Federer Win at ATP Finals
